channel.title: USB midi router with USB hub: where to begin?
channel.description:
Sorry about the n00b question, but I am somewhat lost. I wish to use a USB hub to connect various USB midi devices and virtually connect them. It is my understanding that the most recent version of the patcher (1.0.12-2, though the app shows 1.0.12)) would allow this. My board is on firmware 1.0.0.1
I found the tb/midi/utils/midithru, but just trying all combos and setting it to "live" does nothing (no LED action either). Should I modify the menus to represent the names of the devices I have connected? How do I find the names?
I would be very grateful if anybody could point me in the right direction.

item.title: USB midi router with USB hub: where to begin?
item.dc:creator: @Buis
item.description:
@Buis wrote:

Thanks. I will try to build and run that.

Read full topic
item.source: USB midi router with USB hub: where to begin?

item.title: USB midi router with USB hub: where to begin?
item.dc:creator: @chaocrator a.k.a. Vimanastaffel
item.description:
@chaocrator wrote:

USB hubs support is not available in 1.0.12.
it's in current git (unstable) version only.

Read full topic
item.source: USB midi router with USB hub: where to begin?
